content:
HybridConnectionListener HybridConnectionListener Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Relay
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Relay.dll

Provides a listener for accepting HybridConnections from remote clients.

Edit

In this Article

public class HybridConnectionListener : IConnectionStatusPublic Class HybridConnectionListener
    Implements IConnectionStatus
Inheritance
ObjectObject
HybridConnectionListenerHybridConnectionListener

Constructors

HybridConnectionListener(String) HybridConnectionListener(String)

Edit

Creates a new instance of HybridConnectionListener using the specified connection string.

public HybridConnectionListener(string connectionString)Public Sub New(connectionString As String)
Parameters
connectionString
String String

The connection string to use. This connection string must include the EntityPath property.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

Thrown when the format of the connectionString parameter is incorrect.

HybridConnectionListener(String, String) HybridConnectionListener(String, String)

Edit

Creates a new instance of HybridConnectionListener from a connection string and the specified HybridConection path. Use this overload only when the connection string does not use the EntityPath property.

public HybridConnectionListener(string connectionString, string path)Public Sub New(connectionString As String, path As String)
Parameters
connectionString
String String

The connection string used. This connection string must not include the EntityPath property.

path
String String

The path to the HybridConnection.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

Thrown when the format of the connectionString parameter is incorrect.

HybridConnectionListener(Uri, TokenProvider) HybridConnectionListener(Uri, TokenProvider)

Edit

Create a new HybridConnectionListener instance for accepting HybridConnections.

public HybridConnectionListener(Uri address, TokenProvider tokenProvider)Public Sub New(address As Uri, tokenProvider As TokenProvider)
Parameters
address
Uri Uri

The address on which to listen for HybridConnections. This address should be of the format "sb://contoso.servicebus.windows.net/yourhybridconnection".

tokenProvider
TokenProvider TokenProvider

The TokenProvider for connecting this listener to ServiceBus.

Properties

AcceptHandler AcceptHandler

Edit

Allows installing a custom handler which can inspect request headers, control response headers, decide whether to accept or reject a web-socket upgrade request, and control the status code/description if rejecting. The AcceptHandler should return true to accept a client request or false to reject.

public Func<RelayedHttpListenerContext, Task<bool>> AcceptHandler { get; set; }Public Property AcceptHandler As Func(Of RelayedHttpListenerContext, Task(Of Boolean))
Value
Func<RelayedHttpListenerContext, Task<Boolean>> Func(Of RelayedHttpListenerContext, Task(Of Boolean))

Address Address

Edit

Gets the address on which to listen for HybridConnections. This address should be of the format "sb://contoso.servicebus.windows.net/yourhybridconnection".

public Uri Address { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Address As Uri
Value
Uri Uri

IsOnline IsOnline

Edit

Gets a value that determines whether the connection is online.

public bool IsOnline { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsOnline As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if the connection is alive and online; false if there is no connectivity towards the Azure Service Bus from the current network location.

LastError LastError

Edit

Retrieves the last error encountered when trying to reestablish the connection from the offline state.

public Exception LastError { get; }Public ReadOnly Property LastError As Exception
Value
Exception Exception

Returns a Exception that contains the last error.

Proxy Proxy

Edit

Gets or sets proxy information for connecting to ServiceBus.

public IWebProxy Proxy { get; set; }Public Property Proxy As IWebProxy
Value
IWebProxy IWebProxy

TokenProvider TokenProvider

Edit

Gets the TokenProvider for authenticating this HybridConnection listener.

public TokenProvider TokenProvider { get; }Public ReadOnly Property TokenProvider As TokenProvider
Value
TokenProvider TokenProvider

AcceptConnectionAsync() AcceptConnectionAsync()

Edit

Accepts a new HybridConnection which was initiated by a remote client and returns the Stream.

public Task<HybridConnectionStream> AcceptConnectionAsync()Public Function AcceptConnectionAsync As Task(Of HybridConnectionStream)
Returns
Task<HybridConnectionStream> Task(Of HybridConnectionStream)

CloseAsync() CloseAsync()

Edit

Closes the HybridConnectionListener using the default timeout. Unless specified in the connection string the default is 1 minute.

public Task CloseAsync()Public Function CloseAsync As Task
Returns
Task Task

CloseAsync(CancellationToken) CloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Closes the HybridConnectionListener using the provided CancellationToken.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

A cancellation token to observe.

Returns
Task Task

Closes the HybridConnectionListener using the provided timeout.

timeout
TimeSpan TimeSpan

Task Task

GetRuntimeInformationAsync() GetRuntimeInformationAsync()

Edit

Gets the HybridConnectionRuntimeInformation for this HybridConnection entity using the default timeout. Unless specified in the connection string the default is 1 minute.

Returns

Task<HybridConnectionRuntimeInformation> Task(Of HybridConnectionRuntimeInformation)

OpenAsync() OpenAsync()

Edit

Opens the HybridConnectionListener and registers it as a listener in ServiceBus. Unless specified in the connection string the default is 1 minute.

Returns a string that represents the current object. Includes a TrackingId for end to end correlation.

public override string ToString()Public Overrides Function ToString As String
Returns
String String

Object.ToString()Object.ToString()

Events

Connecting Connecting

Edit

Raised when the Listener is attempting to reconnect with ServiceBus after a connection loss.

public event EventHandler ConnectingPublic Event Connecting As EventHandler

Offline Offline

Edit

Raised when the Listener will no longer be attempting to (re)connect with ServiceBus.

public event EventHandler OfflinePublic Event Offline As EventHandler

Online Online

Edit

Raised when the Listener has successfully connected with ServiceBus

public event EventHandler OnlinePublic Event Online As EventHandler
